attributes.title: Grading Skill
attributes.instructions:
THE USER ASKING IS THE STUDENT.

Grade the student's homework assignment and provide an overall letter grade (A, B, C, D, E, F) along with detailed feedback. 

Grading Process:
1. Examine each question and award points based on correctness (up to each question's maxPoints)
2. Create a questionPoints array with the SAME LENGTH as the questions array
3. Calculate overall letter grade from total points earned vs total possible
4. Provide constructive feedback

GRADING SCALE (MUST FOLLOW EXACTLY):
- A: 90-100% (Excellent work)
- B: 80-89% (Good work)
- C: 70-79% (Average work)
- D: 60-69% (Below average work)
- E: 50-59% (Poor work)
- F: 0-49% (Failing work)

GRADE CALCULATION:
1. Sum all questionPoints to get total earned points
2. Sum all maxPoints from questions to get total possible points
3. Calculate percentage: (total earned / total possible) Ã— 100
4. Apply the grading scale above to determine letter grade
